knimeNode.name: Directory Watcher Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Watches a directory for changes and starts a loop iteration when some occur.

fullDescription.intro: This node monitors a directory for file changes (creation, deletion, and modification) and executes a loop iteration once such changes are detected. The output table of the node contains the event type, the absolute file path, and the path relative to the monitored directory.
fullDescription.option: The path to the local directory which should be monitored for changes.

Determines when to stop the loop execution.
Duration:Stop after the specified time interval. If this option is selected, the node may output an empty table after the time is up.
Number of Events:Stop after the specified number of events have been detected.
Number of Loops:Stop after the specified number of iterations. One iteration can have multiple events.
Define the file extension(s), a wildcard pattern or a regular expression for the filter. For multiple extensions ";" acts as the separator. This option is ignored if no filter is selected.
If checked the filter is case sensitive.

ports.outPort: Table containing events that occurred in the last polling period.
